title: Can I read Quran while lying down? #Assim #assimalhakeem #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: Mariam says can I lie down without any reason and recite the Quran anytime orah for example on a Friday the answer is yes mother tells us that the prophet sallallahu alaihi wasallam used to lie down placing his head on her lap and reciting the Quran so there is no disrespect in this none whatsoever for the Quran and it's totally permissible
